Touch is an upcoming romantic drama film directed by Baltasar Kormákur, written by Ólafur Jóhann Ólafsson and Baltasar Kormákur,[1] and produced by Baltasar Kormákur, Agnes Johansen, and Mike Goodridge.[2][3] The film is based on the 2022 novel of the same name.[4]
Touch is scheduled to be released on July 12, 2024.[5]


Premise[edit]
A widower tries to find his first love 50 years after she disappeared.

Production[edit]
Touch was produced by RVK Studios.[6] Principal photography began on October 9, 2022, in London.[7] In a December 2022 interview, Baltasar Kormákur planned to shoot the film in Iceland and Japan.[8]

Release[edit]
Touch is scheduled to have a limited theatrical release on July 12, 2024.
